summary: SummaryThe CHI 1” Titanium Flat Iron is designed for fast, frizz-free results. The advanced titanium 1" plates heat up quickly and distribute heat evenly, reducing styling time and minimizing heat damage. The built-in Ion Generator works to eliminate frizz, boost shine, and lock in moisture.
details: DetailsBenefitsThe built-in Ion Generator works to eliminate frizz, boost shine, and lock in moisture, leaving your hair looking smooth and healthyTitanium plates heat up quickly for reduced styling timeCustomizable heat settings for safe, effective styling on all hair typesShiny, smooth results in just one pass-saving time and effortFeaturesDual VoltageLED Touch Temp Settings range from 340°F-450°F2 Year Limited WarrantyItem 2641533

reviews.headline: Pretty good
reviews.comments:
I was in the market for a new titanium straightener so when I saw this, I decided to try it out since with my 20 percent off coupon. It definitely looks and feels more luxe than the classic Chi. It feels solid and sturdy, but not too heavy. 

When you first plug it in and turn it on, it's auto-set to 380 degrees and it took me a little while to figure out how to adjust the temperature. I kept pressing the only button, but this just turned it on and off. I finally read the instruction manual and found out that it has a touch-screen for the temperature control, LOL. 

It heats up very quickly and beeps and blinks when it's ready to use. It has a 1-hour auto-shut off feature. 

It straightens my thick, wavy hair with just one pass. However, it doesn't glide through my hair as buttery smooth as I would like and expect from a hair tool at this price point. For comparison, I have a $30 titanium Kipozi straightener that I got from Amazon years ago that glides through my hair more smoothly than this one.

This does a good job of curling my hair, but unfortunately, my hair does snag on the embossed "CHI" lettering. But the curls are beautiful, bouncy and shiny. 

One thing this is lacking is a snap-close and locking feature, which would be more convenient for storing and traveling. 

Overall, this is a good product but I am still on the hunt for that perfect titanium flat iron.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
Salon Quality at Home
reviews.comments: This flat iron is amazing at straighten my hair!   Silky Smooth 4B blowout hair like a salon visit.
